metadata.title: SkillBank - AI Agent Skills Marketplace
metadata.description: Discover, install, and manage skills for your AI coding agents. The marketplace for Claude, Codex, and beyond.

hero.subtitle: Discover, install, and manage skills for Claude Code, Codex, and beyond. One command to unlock new capabilities.

cliFirst.title: CLI First
cliFirst.description: Install skills directly from your terminal. No UI needed, just one command.

openSecure.title: Open & Secure
openSecure.description: All skills are open source and auditable. Know exactly what you're installing.

universal.title: Universal
universal.description: Works with Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Codex, and any agent that reads SKILL.md.

search.title: Search Skills
search.results: {count, plural, =0 {No results} =1 {1 result} other {# results}} for "{query}"
search.noResultsHint: Try different keywords or browse all skills
search.enterTermHint: Search for skills by name, description, or tags

thirdParty.label: Third-party CLI (skills.sh / openskills)
thirdParty.loginRequired: Please login to copy install command

skill.fromGitHub: This skill is from GitHub and will be downloaded from the source repository
skill.fromPlatform: This skill is hosted on SkillBank platform
skill.hasFiles: This skill includes additional files that will be downloaded

skills.title: All Skills
skills.subtitle: Browse all available skills for your AI coding agent
skills.emptyHint: Check back soon for new skills

mySkills.title: My Skills
mySkills.subtitle: Skills you've published or have access to
mySkills.empty: You haven't published any skills yet
mySkills.emptyHint: Use 'skillbank publish' to publish your first skill

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Learn how to use SkillBank
docs.gettingStartedDesc: Install SkillBank CLI and add your first skill
docs.installationDesc: Install the CLI globally or use npx
docs.addSkillDesc: Add a skill to your project
docs.removeSkillDesc: Remove a skill from your project
docs.skillFormatDesc: Learn about the skill file format
docs.skillFormatContent: Skills are defined in SKILL.md files. These files contain instructions and context for AI coding agents.
docs.apiDesc: SkillBank provides a REST API for programmatic access

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

auth.checkEmailDesc: We sent you a confirmation link. Please check your email to complete sign up.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

authors.title: Authors
authors.subtitle: Discover the creators behind AI agent skills
